Plugin.LoadCommand: %(xero(function() local limits = {} local prevtime local max_cap = 10 return function(self) local curtime = GAMESTATE:GetSongTime() if not prevtime then function fpslimit(aft, fps, enable) -- check specifically for false, as `nil` should default to true if enable == false then limits[aft] = nil else limits[aft] = {fps or 60, 0} end end prevtime = curtime self:luaeffect('Load') return end local dt = curtime - prevtime for aft, data in pairs(limits) do data[2] = data[2] + dt * data[1] if data[2] > 1 then data[2] = data[2] - 1 aft:hidden(0) if data[2] > max_cap then data[2] = max_cap end else aft:hidden(1) end end prevtime = curtime end end))()
